Description.Text: Hotel Rothschild 22 is a luxury 5-star property offering stylish accommodation in the heart of Tel Aviv. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, fine onsite dining and a fantastic location close to Migdal Shalom. Tel Aviv is a beautiful, coastal town established in 1909 that has become renowned as an international centre of business, culture, technology, cuisine and nightlife. Places of interest include the historic Old Jaffa, Rabin Square, many museums, parks and beautiful beaches and White City, a district of Bauhaus buildings now a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Tel Aviv destinations. The hotel is housed in a 21st-century high-rise building with a state-of-the-art facade. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Deluxe rooms are 23sqm and decorated in a modern style with neutral tones and tiled floors. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, a 48-inch flat-screen satellite TV, safe and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a large walk-in shower. The hotel restaurant serves Israeli and Mediterranean dishes in a stylish setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the bar, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.
